name: Palette (Space Shark Studios)
description:
The World of Palette

You control the colors of the world in this platformer made for CoMo Game Jam VII. Use the portals of light to change which colors are visible, unlocking (or locking!) different paths and passages. Make it home to progress to the next level.

Controls

Left - A or Left stick left on gamepad

Right - D or Left stick right on gamepad

Jump - W, Space, or A on gamepad
